channel.title: Well
channel.description: I was wondering is there a limit to the number of times you can cum a day? as my friend who has a hot gf does it 24/7.

item.title: Well
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

[quote=“Satan`, post:4, topic:241103”][quote author=BlazezFire link=topic=317424.msg2518531#msg2518531 date=1225759541]

HAHAHAHA, Please tell me you are kidding.

Nah my firend had to go to the hospital once because he was cumming so much XD.
[/quote]
AFAIK, that would be some sort of either A.) reverse erectile dysfunction or B.) an outrageous exaggeration or lie.

Anyways, to give you a serious answer, it really depends on a number of factors like the last time you ejaculated and other things. From my personal experience it is possible to do it quite a few number of times a day but without a sufficient amount of rest in between some rather intense pain can be caused in the testicular area.

As far as females, females are known to either have multiple orgasms on occasions but judging by the way you speak you are no where near the age where any of this information is important.[/quote]
Ah,i have no idea unless my friend has lied to me i will ask him.

Read full topic
